attract.title: Asteroid alert!
attract.body:
Raise your arms above
your head to take control
of the shields.

calibration.title: Arm the shields
calibration.body:
To continue,
activate all 7 shields
with your arms.

error.title: Still there?
error.body:
Make sure you're
still inside the frame, and no
one else is in view.

no-video.title: Video Unavailable
no-video.body:
Access to the camera is required
to play this game. Allow camera
access to continue.

generic-error.title: Error Title
generic-error.body:
A brief and friendly
description of the problem, and suggestions for fixing it.

share.title: All clear!
share.body:
The spacecraft
has reached a safe area.
Nice work.
share.roadshow-text: I blocked <score> asteroids and got ranked as <rank> playing Pose Shield at #TensorFlowRoadshow! Check it out at g.co/PoseShield
share.world-text: I blocked <score> asteroids and got ranked as <rank> playing Pose Shield at #TensorFlowWorld! Check it out at g.co/PoseShield
share.web-text: I blocked <score> asteroids and got ranked as <rank> playing Pose Shield! Check it out at g.co/PoseShield
